fields.name: MetricName
fields.description: Gets the name of the metric. e.g., CPU, Number of Queries.

fields.name: StartTime
fields.description: Gets the start time of time interval given by this MetricInfo.

fields.name: TimeGrain
fields.description: Gets the duration of time interval for the value given by this MetricInfo. e.g., PT1H (1 hour)

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: Gets the unit in which metric is measured. e.g., DTU, Frequency

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Gets the value of the metric in the time interval given by this MetricInfo.
